title: Wealthy individuals fuel boom in private credit: FT (BX:NYSE) - Seeking Alpha
summary:
Private credit funds are attracting record inflows from wealthy investors, making up for slower commitments from pensions and endowments, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.
Affluent Americans invested $48 billion in such funds in the first half of 2025, already surpassing
